Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) require seals that can function in harsh, elevated temperature environments.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Comprehensive characterization and understanding of seals is needed for commercially viable SOFCs.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The present research focuses on a novel ceramic/glass composite seal that is produced by roller compaction or tape casting of glass and ceramic powders and an organic binder.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Upon heat treatment, micro-voids and surface anomalies are formed.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Increased heating and cooling rates during the heat treatment resulted in more and larger voids.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The first goal of the current research is to suggest an appropriate heating and cooling rate to minimize the formation of microstructural defects.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After identifying an appropriate cure cycle, seals were thermally cycled and then characterized with laser dilatometry, X-ray diffraction, and sonic resonance.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: From these experiments the crystalline phases, thermal expansion, and elastic properties were determined.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Subsequently compression testing with an acoustic emission (AE) sensor and post-test microstructural analysis were used to identify the formation of damage.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By fully understanding the characteristics of this ceramic/glass composite seal, next generation seals can be fabricated for improved performance.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal characterization of a ceramic/glass composite seal for solid oxide fuel cells
